ETYMOLOGY: From Old English mōnaþ, related to mōna (moon). The period of the month corresponds roughly to the period of the moon's cycle.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Any of the twelve periods of time into which the year is divided, usually consisting of 28, 29, 30, or 31 days.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一年中被划分成的十二个时间段之一，通常包含28、29、30或31天。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We plan to travel abroad next month for two weeks.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们计划下个月出国旅行两周。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The time required for the Moon to complete one cycle of phases, approximately 29.5 days.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 月球完成一个相位周期所需的时间，约为29.5天（朔望月）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Early calendars were based directly on the observation of the lunar month.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 早期的日历直接基于对朔望月的观察。
